sourcesContent:
<template>
	<input v-model="input">
	<button>Add to list</button>
</template>

<script>
export default {
	data() {
		return {
			input: '',
			list: []
		}
	},
	methods: {
		addItem() {
			this.list.push({
				id: this.list.length + 1,
				text: this.input,
				is_deleted: false
			})
			this.input = ''
		}
	}
}
</script>

<style>
</style>
